LocaleResource.Value: Adds Apple authentication to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up Apple authentication:

  • Create a new Services ID and private key in the Apple Developer Portal.
  • Enter the generated Team ID, Key ID, Client ID and private key below.
  • The URL listed below must be registered as a return URL in the Apple configuration.

LocaleResource.Name: PrivateKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The contents of your private key (PEM format).

LocaleResource.Value: The OAuth Redirect URI to be entered on Apple.
